item.description:
Monthly Potluck: Each third Saturday, we host a raw food potluck at our home at 254 Cider Hill Rd., York, ME, at 5 pm until weâ€™re tired of laughing and talking. All are welcome. Just bring a raw dish to share, a salad or some fruit. We prefer organic, if possible. Be prepared to have the best time ever!

We hope you can join us for all of these amazing events. And don't forget to visit us online at aimeeslivinmagic.com.

All our love,
Aimee and Denny Perrin
Aimee's Livin' Magic
254 Cider Hill Road
York, ME 03909
www.aimeeslivinmagic.com
www.longevitychallenge.com

Posted by: www.essenic.com
item.name: Aimee's Potluck: York, ME
